attributes.action: set up a small claims court system that allows ordinary people access to legal redress for damages when someone slanders or libels them or breaches their human rights .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to set up a small claims court system that allows ordinary people access to legal redress for damages when someone slanders or libels them or breaches their human rights without them having to have the financial means to employ barristers or other expensive lawyers.
